title: A Most notable example of an vngracious son who in the pride of his heart denyed his owne fathe[r] and how God for his offence, turned his meate into loathsome toades : to the tune of Lord Darley.
notes: Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Bound and filmed with "A most excellent ballad of an old man and his wife" (STC 1329.5, cataloged separately).
Reproduction of original in the Pepys Library.
